Text.name: Text0
Text.content:
More information on User-Generated Content is found in

  • OpenCms JavaDoc: Look for the package org.opencms.ugc.client.export to get detailed information on the JavaScript-API
  • opencms.tld (and the according documentation): here you'll find information about the tag <cms:ugc>
  • OpenCms Demo Website: watch out for an example for User-Generated Content.
